name: Protect the Plant (smallgaier)
description:
Defend the flower from the bugs and keep it alive!

Controls:

  • Sun shield points in direction of mouse automatically
  • Click and hold left mouse button to activate shield

Tips:

  • Don't keep the shield activated for too long! If your solar energy (yellow bar) runs out, you'll have to wait for the shield to cool down before using again
  • If lots of bugs are surrounding you, swipe your mouse side-to-side to cleave through them

I hope you have fun! This is my first Ludum Dare submission and first complete game made in Godot from scratch!

Post your highest score in the comments! The highest I've gotten is 158
